text: an oversensitive tracking system due to its design to track polar orbiting satellites. A modification narrowing the tracking bandwidth solved this problem. For the AN/ MSC-46 terminals the MTTF experienced was about 75 hours. For AN/TSC-54 ter­ minals it was about 300 hours. 12-29 CITED REFERENCES 1. J. W.
